reviewText: First musical DVD or video that I have purchased where the music isn't synchronized with the picture. Don't waste your money.

No one in the QC Dept.obviously didn't check out this DVD.  This inexcusible error is a real pity since the content has some of the rarest of all Benny Goodman performances. I sure would like to see this error corrected and notify me and other purchasers that we can replace this stupid mistake.
